description.lang: The Smart Siren is designed to issue alarms to scare off intruder. This Smart Siren adopts z-wave technology, if a z-wave network is built in the user' home,office, warehouse or other places, when an alarm in the z-wave network is triggered, this Smart Siren will issuehigh decibel sound and light alarms, and alarm information will also be sent to the user's phone App.
Association group 1: Lifeline association groupInclude command classes: Switch Binary report ,Battery and Device Reset Locally notification.
